thread.section_title: The Bentley Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Stylish space, nice rooms and amazing bell hops!
thread.title_full: Stylish space, nice rooms and amazing bell hops! - Review of The Bentley Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Robert L
title: Stylish space, nice rooms and amazing bell hops!
text: Great location and a well decorated lobby and rooms. The bed was very comfortable and I was able to control the temperature of the room to suit my need for very cool sleeping. The staff was so accommodating and friendly except one of the front desk staff. I would definitely stay here again!
